introduction: I could not believe how bad the acting and so called special effects were. I think the budget for this movie was in the region of £10 pounds because it really is that bad. The actors(i use this term very loosely) were probably volunteers and as for the poor script and local joke shop make up it was astonishing how bad this was. The final straw which made me press stop on my DVD player was the in hand squirty fake blood that was clearly being directed whilst being pressed and you could not only see the blood coming out of the capsule you could also hear the capsule being pressed. Honestly avoid at all costs, unless you wish to sit in with a DVD the is not only going to shock you into STOP button submission or have you wishing for a power cut to put you out of your misery.在一个除夕聚会，一群朋友欢聚庆祝。可他们不知道他们会被困那么久，因为房子被隔离了。 谁会知道他们当中一个人患上一种致命的疾病呢？
